Array2_CopyItemsInArray1: If no items selector is used in path, like 'where', 'first', 'reverse' etc, items of single array selected by path will be copied.
Array3_CopyItemsInArray1_WithWhere1: If items selector is used in path, 'where', 'first', 'reverse' etc, items selected by path will be copied.
Array4_CopyItemsInArray1_WithWhere2: If items selector is used in path, 'where', 'first', 'reverse' etc, items selected by path will be copied.
